overview: RJ Martino is co-founder of iProv. LLC, a computer networking, web design, and marketing company based out of Little Rock, AR. RJ has started multiple companies and has expertise in many areas of the computing industry. RJ has equal knowledge of technical components and the practical application of those components. RJ Martino leads the development team for ThanksBud, Inc. and makes decisions about structural design, technical integrity, and back-end development. Currently, he oversees the development division of ThanksBud, Inc., a tech startup and online marketplace for the small services industry. RJ pioneers new features and hires new employees to work within the development division. As a founding partner, RJ plays a role in making any large decisions that will effect the future of ThanksBud, Inc and all subsidiaries.
